summary: It add player home to Lake Illinalta near Falkhreath and it is good to all type of characters
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i1094.photobucket.com/albums/i442/EpizMakeboyy/Skyrim/Faemhall.jpg[/img]

***********************************************************
[color=violet] [u]Good to Know [/u] [/color]
***********************************************************
I thinked that I dont say this, but this is my [b]first mod[/b] to Skyrim and there maybe is few bugs but I appreciate if you could tell that to me and not shout me in to pieces.

***********************************************************
[size=4][color=red] [u]IMPORTANT [/u] [/color][/size]
***********************************************************

[size=3][color=red] WARNING IF YOU ARE GOING TO UPDATE YOUR FILE BE SURE TO GET ALL ITEMS YOU WANT OF YOUR HOUSE AND MAYBE ON WHOLE ISLAND AND THEN REMOVE THE FILE AND DOWNLOAD NEW. I RECOMMEND TO STAY ON OLD VERSION BECAUSE IT ADDS ONLY 5 MANNEQUINS AND OTHER CHANGES ONLY THE LIGHTNING [/color][/size]


***********************************************************
[color=green] [u]Island includes [/u] [/color]
***********************************************************
[list]
 [*]House
 [*]Mill
 [*]Shack
 [*]Dock
 [*]Smelter
 [*]Anvil
 [*]Workbench
 [*]Grindstone
 [*]Enchanting table
 [*]Alchemist table
 [*]Archery range( Tree round targets)
 [*]Practice Dummy

***********************************************************
[color=green] [u]House includes [/u] [/color]
***********************************************************

 [*]4 Mannequins
 [*]2 Display cases (1 Big 1 Small)
 [*]5 Weapon racks
 [*]2 Weapon plaques
 [*]3 Bookshelf
 [*]Medicine Cage(resets)
 [*]5 Other containers

NEW VERSION ADDS
 [*]1 Full size Mannequin
 [*]4 Mini mannequins
**********************************************************
[color=red] [u]What you need [/u] [/color]
**********************************************************
You need nothing but I recommend few things listed below.

 [*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7654]Realistic Lighting With Customization by Pluto - 747823 - Leviathan1753 - Sydney666[/url]

 [*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8741]Unlimited Bookshelves by da5id2701[/url]

 [*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9048]You are not the Dragonborn by frodone[/url]

 [*][url=http://www.elderscrolls.com/skyrim]The Skyrim by Bethseda[/url][/list]

Thank for your time and remember to [u] Endorse [/u]
author: Makezi
